Title: Blood Done Sign My Name.
Subtitle: A True Story.
Authors: Timothy B. Tyson.
Categories: Biography & Autobiography.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=V3SKDQAAQBAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: The author returns to his hometown of Oxford, North Carolina, to make sense of the thirty-year-old murder of a black man by a Klansman, and the Klansman's subsequent acquittal by an all-white jury..
